turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to order two large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like on those 2 large pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one barbecue chicken and the other chicken bacon ranch and both of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the order for 2 large pizzas, 1 bbq chicken, 1 chicken bacon ranch, and both with extra cheese comes out to $25.66.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order, it'll be ready for you to pick it up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, nice. No, that'll be it.
